title: Are there any particular pianists that have been extremely successful in classical and jazz? (Besides Gershwin) - Quora

response.answer_text: Andre Previn might be the most notable recent example with substantial career in both plus film music. André Previn - Wikipedia Before him, Oscar Levant was the “serious” pianist who played jazz (mostly Gershwin) and appeared in numerous films as wisecracking sidekick. Levant plays Chopin…  Levant plays Khachaturian…  Levant plays Gershwin…  Levant was also famous for show biz bon mots like, “I knew Doris Day before she was a virgin”.
